{{Description|Have you heard of Deaconess Barbara? Everyone in Mondstadt loves her. There seems to be something on her mind lately, and no one seems to know what's bothering her. If you happen to meet her by chance, why not stay and have a chat with her? It's up to you to help her smile return!}}
'''Baptism of Song''' is a Permanent [[Event]] released in [[Version 1.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* Permanently available after the Version 1.1 update

===Requirements===
* Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 18 or above

===Summary===
* After the Version 1.1 update, Travelers at Adventure Rank 18 or above that have completed the quest [[A Long Shot]] will win "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}})!
* You can only claim the reward for this event once. The event page will close once you have claimed your reward.
* Travelers who have already claimed rewards via in-game mail for the [[Barbara's Shining Debut]] event in [[Version 1.0]] can still take part in this event and claim Barbara.
